title: Reported Speech - Questions 4
instructions: Put the sentences into reported speech.
exa:
What did you go?
He asked me what I had done.

contents.longsent: Who are you talking to again on the phone?
alters: who she was talking to again on the phone.

contents.longsent: What are your shoes doing here?
alters: what my shoes were doing there.

contents.longsent: How many pages have you read since last week.
alters: how many pages I had read since last week.

contents.longsent: Why haven't you finished this app?
alters: why I hadn't finished that app.

contents.longsent: Why do you learn so much?
